# previewImageHandler

**Instance Property**

The custom preview image handler block for the item provider.

## Declaration

```swift
var previewImageHandler: NSItemProvider.LoadHandler? { get set }
```

## Discussion

In your image handler block, return an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSURL] object that specifies a file, or return an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSData] object.

## Loading a preview image

- **loadPreviewImage(options:completionHandler:)**: Loads the preview image for the item that the item provider represents.
